description:
Climb frequently enough and you'll probably experience belay neck. When that pain gets to be too much to bear, these glasses let you safely track your partner's "take-climbing-take" sequence without feeling like you're watching a movie from the front row.

  • High transparency prisms provide excellent optical performance and a natural line of sight
  • Stainless steel frames survive the occasional dynamic belay
  • Silicon nose pads for comfort on long, long belays
  • Adjustable arms accommodate a wide range of head shapes
  • Rigid zippered case included
name: YY Vertical Colourful Belay Glasses - Unisex
